## Source: ossf-package-analysis (81f0076033d29c2e9abffb4d86808030d872497b5c7787cb30218afeb0451384)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'codeql-sarif-security-standard-annotator' @ 0.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
